txt.en: Cánnakh can be found in Aughaire.\n\nYou should speak with Cánnakh.
Foul, ancient evil from The Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu has made its way to the surface of Angmar, including Shakatrog, who will destroy anything in his path.
Shakatrog can be found somewhere in Angmar.\n\nYou should defeat Shakatrog.

'Gertheryg are ancient Trolls. I know you've dealt with Trolls before but prepare yourself if you haven't faced a Gorthorog.\n\n'Shakatrog is a brutal creature. If he finds the ancient power before I do, he will certainly wield it for the will of Sauron. I shudder to think of such things. Please stop Shakatrog from his mission and I will continue to study my old maps and manuscripts.'

'That Gorthorog was a powerful enemy. I hope that your heroics have gone unnoticed by the enemy. They certainly have not gone unnoticed by me.\n\n'I was discussing The Rift with an old friend and he mentioned that the forgotten city once covered much of the land. What ever we're looking for was most likely lost ages ago.'
